faqs.question: How do I generate a service token?
faqs.answer: Visit the Timex website, log in to your account, go to the 'Service' section, and follow the on-screen instructions to generate a token.

faqs.question: What is the warranty period for Timex watches?
faqs.answer: Timex watches come with a one-year warranty from the date of purchase.

faqs.question: Can I return a product after purchase?
faqs.answer: Yes, Timex allows returns within 30 days of delivery if the product is unused and in original packaging.

faqs.question: Can I buy watches online?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can buy watches online with ease & convenience. You can buy watches from shop.timexindia.com or from other e-com websites. Kindly note that, if you wish to buy watches from other e-com sites then please buy only from authorized sellers.

faqs.question: Are watches purchased online authentic with full service warranty applicable?
faqs.answer: Watches purchased from shop.timexindia.com are 100% genuine and carry full service warranty commitment as per the company policy. Watches purchased from other e-commerce sites will be valid for service warranty only if bought through authorized sellers.

faqs.question: Where can I find replacement watch straps?
faqs.answer: If you're having difficulty finding your strap, you can contact our Customer Service centers or call our toll-free helpline at 1800-419-2727 (Mon to Sat, 10 AM to 7 PM). Replacement strap prices vary depending on the model of your watch, and watches may need to be sent in for assessment and quotation.

faqs.question: Can you explain your repair or replace policy for warranty service?
faqs.answer: Typically, we repair your watch by installing new or reconditioned and inspected components, or we replace it with an identical or similar model depending on the case.

faqs.question: Can you tell me what it will cost to repair my watch?
faqs.answer: Repair charges vary depending on the style, age, and condition of the watch. We advise visiting the nearest customer service center for assistance with an accurate estimate.

faqs.question: How long does it normally take to get my watch back?
faqs.answer: The repair and service timelines depend on the style, age, and condition of the watch. Typically, you will receive your watch back within approximately 2 to 4 weeks.

faqs.question: What is the difference between a water resistant and waterproof watch?
faqs.answer: Water resistant means the watch can resist water penetration to a certain extent. Waterproof implies no water can pass through at all. Currently, Timex only sells water resistant watches.
